Name: LineVox
About the game: LineVox is a cyberpunk-style casual game suitable for both one player and several players with the ability to play on one computer, over a local network or online. Here you control a ship that leaves a trail that is an obstacle for you and other players or bots. You need to jump over or avoid obstacles, teleport and pick up bonuses that help or hinder you from winning. Added achievements for more interest. The game has: - Choose from a variety of maps and ships. - Ability to play with friends on the same computer or over the network. - Obstacles in the form of lasers, platforms and objects. - Various boosters. - Cyberpunk atmosphere.
